This looks very interesting! When will there be a paper available?

Julian

2008/10/12 Kenneth Stanley <kstanley@...>:
> Erin Hastings and I have been leading a team of students for some time
> on the problem of automated content generation in video games through
> evolutionary algorithms. We're not quite at the release stage, but
> some of you may be interested to see what we're working on: It's a
> multiplayer space shooter called Galactic Arms Race (GAR) that
> continually produces new kinds of weapons based on the weapons people
> have liked in the past. Weapons in GAR are particle systems that are
> controlled by CPPNs evolved with NEAT.
>
> You can see some screenshots and other information here:
>
> http://gar.eecs.ucf.edu/
>
> ken
>
>
